columns.description: Pitch classification from Baseball Savant (FF, SL, CH, etc.).
columns.name: pitch_type

columns.description: Local date of the game (YYYY-MM-DD).
columns.name: game_date

columns.description: Out-of-hand velocity in miles per hour (Pitch F/X prior to 2017, Statcast thereafter).
columns.name: release_speed

columns.description: Horizontal release position in feet from the catcher's point of view (negative is inside to right-handed batters).
columns.name: release_pos_x

columns.description: Vertical release height in feet from the catcher's perspective.
columns.name: release_pos_z

columns.description: Batter or pitcher name tied to the pitch event (context-dependent).
columns.name: player_name

columns.description: MLBAM batter identifier for the plate appearance.
columns.name: batter

columns.description: MLBAM pitcher identifier throwing the pitch.
columns.name: pitcher

columns.description: Result of the plate appearance (single, strikeout, walk, etc.).
columns.name: events

columns.description: Textual summary of the pitch outcome (e.g., 'Swinging Strike').
columns.name: description

columns.description: Spin direction in degrees, 0° = toward 3B, measured from catcher's view.
columns.name: spin_dir

columns.description: Legacy spin rate in rpm (deprecated field, use release_spin_rate).
columns.name: spin_rate_deprecated

columns.description: Legacy pitch break angle (degrees) from Pitch F/X era.
columns.name: break_angle_deprecated

columns.description: Legacy break length in inches from Pitch F/X.
columns.name: break_length_deprecated

columns.description: Strike zone bin (1-14 MLBAM zone chart).
columns.name: zone

columns.description: Text as seen on MLB Gameday describing the pitch.
columns.name: des

columns.description: Game type code (R=regular season, P=postseason, S=spring, etc.).
columns.name: game_type

columns.description: Batter stance (R or L).
columns.name: stand

columns.description: Pitcher throwing hand (R or L).
columns.name: p_throws

columns.description: Home team MLB abbreviation.
columns.name: home_team

columns.description: Away team MLB abbreviation.
columns.name: away_team

columns.description: Pitch result shorthand (B ball, S strike, X ball in play).
columns.name: type

columns.description: Gameday hit location number for balls in play.
columns.name: hit_location

columns.description: Batted-ball type (ground_ball, line_drive, fly_ball, popup).
columns.name: bb_type

columns.description: Ball count prior to the pitch.
columns.name: balls

columns.description: Strike count prior to the pitch.
columns.name: strikes

columns.description: Season year of the game.
columns.name: game_year

columns.description: Horizontal movement in inches at home plate (positive = arm side to RHP).
columns.name: pfx_x

columns.description: Vertical movement in inches relative to gravity (positive = rise).
columns.name: pfx_z

columns.description: Horizontal crossing location in feet relative to the plate center (negative = inside to RHH).
columns.name: plate_x

columns.description: Vertical crossing height in feet at the front of home plate.
columns.name: plate_z

columns.description: Runner ID on third base (null if empty).
columns.name: on_3b

columns.description: Runner ID on second base (null if empty).
columns.name: on_2b

columns.description: Runner ID on first base (null if empty).
columns.name: on_1b

columns.description: Number of outs in the inning before the pitch.
columns.name: outs_when_up

columns.description: Inning number (1..9+).
columns.name: inning

columns.description: Half-inning flag ('Top' or 'Bottom').
columns.name: inning_topbot

columns.description: Hit coordinate X from Statcast spray chart (feet).
columns.name: hc_x

columns.description: Hit coordinate Y from Statcast spray chart (feet).
columns.name: hc_y

columns.description: Historical time-from-start stamp (deprecated).
columns.name: tfs_deprecated

columns.description: Historical UTC time stamp (deprecated).
columns.name: tfs_zulu_deprecated

columns.description: Home-plate umpire name for the game.
columns.name: umpire

columns.description: Unique string ID for the pitch event from Statcast (timestamp + pitch no.).
columns.name: sv_id

columns.description: Initial X velocity component (ft/s) at release.
columns.name: vx0

columns.description: Initial Y velocity component (ft/s) at release (toward home).
columns.name: vy0

columns.description: Initial Z velocity component (ft/s) at release (upward positive).
columns.name: vz0

columns.description: Acceleration in X direction (ft/s²).
columns.name: ax

columns.description: Acceleration in Y direction (ft/s²).
columns.name: ay

columns.description: Acceleration in Z direction (ft/s²).
columns.name: az

columns.description: Top of batter-specific strike zone in feet.
columns.name: sz_top

columns.description: Bottom of batter-specific strike zone in feet.
columns.name: sz_bot

columns.description: Projected distance in feet for balls in play (0 if not hit).
columns.name: hit_distance_sc

columns.description: Exit velocity in mph for batted balls.
columns.name: launch_speed

columns.description: Launch angle in degrees relative to horizontal (positive = upward).
columns.name: launch_angle

columns.description: Perceived velocity accounting for extension and spin decay (mph).
columns.name: effective_speed

columns.description: Measured spin rate in rpm at release.
columns.name: release_spin_rate

columns.description: Extension in feet (distance from rubber to release point).
columns.name: release_extension

columns.description: StatsAPI game identifier.
columns.name: game_pk

columns.description: Catcher MLBAM id on the field.
columns.name: fielder_2

columns.description: First baseman MLBAM id.
columns.name: fielder_3

columns.description: Second baseman MLBAM id.
columns.name: fielder_4

columns.description: Third baseman MLBAM id.
columns.name: fielder_5

columns.description: Shortstop MLBAM id.
columns.name: fielder_6

columns.description: Left fielder MLBAM id.
columns.name: fielder_7

columns.description: Center fielder MLBAM id.
columns.name: fielder_8

columns.description: Right fielder MLBAM id.
columns.name: fielder_9

columns.description: Release point distance toward home plate in feet (positive).
columns.name: release_pos_y

columns.description: Expected batting average based on exit velo + launch angle.
columns.name: estimated_ba_using_speedangle

columns.description: Expected wOBA from exit velo + launch angle.
columns.name: estimated_woba_using_speedangle

columns.description: wOBA value credited for the play result.
columns.name: woba_value

columns.description: wOBA denominator contribution for plate appearances.
columns.name: woba_denom

columns.description: BABIP contribution (1 for balls in play hits, else 0).
columns.name: babip_value

columns.description: Isolated power value credited (extra-base bases / AB).
columns.name: iso_value

columns.description: Discrete bin representing the exit velo + angle pairing.
columns.name: launch_speed_angle

columns.description: Sequential at-bat number for the batter in the game.
columns.name: at_bat_number

columns.description: Sequential pitch number within the at-bat.
columns.name: pitch_number

columns.description: Human-readable pitch label (e.g., 'Slider').
columns.name: pitch_name

columns.description: Home team score prior to the pitch.
columns.name: home_score

columns.description: Away team score prior to the pitch.
columns.name: away_score

columns.description: Batting team's score prior to the pitch.
columns.name: bat_score

columns.description: Fielding team's score prior to the pitch.
columns.name: fld_score

columns.description: Away score after the play result.
columns.name: post_away_score

columns.description: Home score after the play result.
columns.name: post_home_score

columns.description: Batting team score after the play result.
columns.name: post_bat_score

columns.description: Fielding team score after the play result.
columns.name: post_fld_score

columns.description: Infield defensive alignment label (standard, shift, infield in, etc.).
columns.name: if_fielding_alignment

columns.description: Outfield defensive alignment label (standard, shallow, shift).
columns.name: of_fielding_alignment

columns.description: Axis of spin in degrees (0 = pure backspin).
columns.name: spin_axis

columns.description: Change in home win expectancy caused by the pitch outcome.
columns.name: delta_home_win_exp

columns.description: Change in run expectancy for the batting team.
columns.name: delta_run_exp

columns.description: Measured bat speed in mph when available.
columns.name: bat_speed

columns.description: Swing path length in feet/seconds (experimental).
columns.name: swing_length

columns.description: Expected slugging percentage for the contact quality.
columns.name: estimated_slg_using_speedangle

columns.description: Run expectancy swing attributable to the pitcher.
columns.name: delta_pitcher_run_exp

columns.description: Experimental hyper-speed metric combining bat/pitch velocities.
columns.name: hyper_speed

columns.description: Home minus away score during the pitch.
columns.name: home_score_diff

columns.description: Batting team minus fielding team score during the pitch.
columns.name: bat_score_diff

columns.description: Home club win expectancy before the pitch.
columns.name: home_win_exp

columns.description: Batting team win expectancy before the pitch.
columns.name: bat_win_exp

columns.description: Pitcher age using legacy calculation (years).
columns.name: age_pit_legacy

columns.description: Batter age using legacy calculation (years).
columns.name: age_bat_legacy

columns.description: Pitcher age in decimal years on game date.
columns.name: age_pit

columns.description: Batter age in decimal years on game date.
columns.name: age_bat

columns.description: Number of times the lineup has turned over for the pitcher (1st, 2nd, etc.).
columns.name: n_thruorder_pitcher

columns.description: Batter's prior plate appearances earlier in the game.
columns.name: n_priorpa_thisgame_player_at_bat

columns.description: Days since the pitcher last appeared.
columns.name: pitcher_days_since_prev_game

columns.description: Days since the batter last appeared.
columns.name: batter_days_since_prev_game

columns.description: Scheduled days until the pitcher’s next appearance (if known).
columns.name: pitcher_days_until_next_game

columns.description: Scheduled days until the batter’s next game (if known).
columns.name: batter_days_until_next_game

columns.description: Actual vertical break in inches including gravity (Statcast API).
columns.name: api_break_z_with_gravity

columns.description: Horizontal break in inches toward the pitcher’s arm side (Statcast API).
columns.name: api_break_x_arm

columns.description: Horizontal break in inches toward the batter (inward).
columns.name: api_break_x_batter_in

columns.description: Arm-slot angle in degrees measured at release.
columns.name: arm_angle

columns.description: Bat attack angle at contact (degrees).
columns.name: attack_angle

columns.description: Horizontal swing direction (pull vs oppo) in degrees.
columns.name: attack_direction

columns.description: Overall swing plane tilt in degrees.
columns.name: swing_path_tilt

columns.description: Horizontal distance between swing path intercept and batter position (inches).
columns.name: intercept_ball_minus_batter_pos_x_inches

columns.description: Vertical distance between swing path intercept and batter position (inches).
columns.name: intercept_ball_minus_batter_pos_y_inches

columns.description: Season year of record.
columns.name: season

columns.description: Calendar month number (1-12).
columns.name: month

columns.description: Calendar day of month (1-31).
columns.name: day

description: Pitch-by-pitch Statcast feed (Baseball Savant CSV export) including release metrics, movement, batter/pitcher context, win-expectancy deltas, and experimental bat-tracking features.
name: Raw Pitch Logs
